import os VIDEO_DIR = "videos" OUTPUT_FILE = "index.html" video_files = [f for f in os.listdir(VIDEO_DIR) if f.lower().endswith((".mp4", ".webm", ".ogg"))] with open(OUTPUT_FILE, "w") as f: f.write(""" HTML5 Video Gallery

HTML5 Video Gallery

""") for video in video_files: f.write(f"""

{video}

\n""") f.write("""

Play Your Own Videos



After selecting files, your browser can play them locally.

""") print(f"Generated {OUTPUT_FILE} with {len(video_files)} videos.")
